content.query:
-- Dedicated pool
CREATE TABLE prod.YellowTaxis_RoundRobin
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)
AS
SELECT * 
FROM ext.YellowTaxis;

-- Check distribution of data
DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('prod.YellowTaxis_RoundRobin')

-- Create Hash table for Yellow Taxis, based on PULocationID
CREATE TABLE prod.YellowTaxis_Hash
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(PULocationID)
)
AS
SELECT  *
FROM prod.YellowTaxis_RoundRobin

SELECT * FROM prod.YellowTaxis_Hash

-- Check distribution of data
DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('prod.YellowTaxis_Hash')
